name: invoiceplane
description: InvoicePlane is a classic self hosted invoicing and billing application. It lets businesses create quotes, invoices, recurring bills and track payments with a straightforward web interface and customizable templates.

features.title: Invoice Creation
features.description: Generate professional invoices with customizable templates

features.title: Quote Management
features.description: Create and send quotes that can be converted to invoices

features.title: Payment Tracking
features.description: Record payments and track outstanding balances

features.title: Client Management
features.description: Maintain client database with contact information and history

features.title: Recurring Invoices
features.description: Set up automatic recurring billing for subscription services

features.title: Tax Support
features.description: Calculate taxes with configurable tax rates and rules

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Export invoices and quotes as PDF documents

features.title: Multi
features.description: Support international clients with multiple currency options
